channel.title: CVE Feed for nofearinc -- DX Share Selection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nofearinc -- DX Share Selection

item.title: CVE-2022-2001|2024-08-03T00:24:43.674Z -- nofearinc -- dx%20share%20selection
item.description: The DX Share Selection plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including 1.4. This is due to missing nonce protection on the dxss_admin_page() function found in the ~/dx-share-selection.php file. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject malicious web scripts into the page, granted they can trick a site's administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
